item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA
1st Saturday of Every Month

On Saturday we celebrate our ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY at Maddy’s Lounge.

We will be celebrating with a complimentary Kowloons buffet, FREE Raffle tickets to win some great gifts and gift cards and we will be doing a 50/50 raffle where all the proceeds will be giving to the people of HAITI.

We will have DJ JODI as our SPECIAL GUEST DJ in the club at this event mixing her tunes, while Connie will be singing away doing her KARAOKE in the Lounge.

To be followed at The Hide Away with D.J. Tracy mixing her music all night long till 1:30 AM and THE NEW POSSIBILITIES celebrating their C.D. Release party from 8:30 pm to 9:30 pm.

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Hi Def TV (Sports Channel)
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Premium Liquor
• KENO
• $10.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
Any questions email BlushBoston@yahoo.com
or www.BlushBoston.com
item.name: Maddy's Lounge Anniversary Party
